name: Guitar Hero: Van Halen
description:
Guitar Hero: Van Halen is an arcade game developed by Activision, Neversoft Entertainment and Budcat Creations. It came out on 22-12-2009. Activision Blizzard published the game. The game is rated as "Recommended" on RAWG.
You can play Guitar Hero: Van Halen on PlayStation 2, Wii and PlayStation 3. The game is sold via PlayStation Store and Nintendo eShop.
